Software Disclaimer

Models

Treat EV Batteries at End-of-Life

Use of Concept: Compounds

Description

For the output from pyrometallurgy, compounds include nickel, manganes, and cobalt. Lithium may be included.
For the output from hydrometallurgy, compounds include cobalt, manganese, and lithium.

Owning Diagram: A3: Recover Materials/Devices

ICOM Details:

  • Output on Activity A33 Recycle .
  • Output inherited from Activity A3 Recover Materials/Devices .
